005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.MarkupLine;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.impl.DefaultAllowedValue;
010
011import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
012import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
013
014/**
015 * Represents an individual enumerated value associated with an
016 * {@link IAllowedValuesConstraint}.
017 */
018public interface IAllowedValue {
019  /**
020   * Construct a new allowed value entry for use in an
021   * {@link IAllowedValuesConstraint}.
022   *
023   * @param value
024   *          the allowed value
025   * @param description
026   *          a textual description of the value
027   * @param deprecatedVersion
028   *          the version this value was deprecated in
029   * @return the new allowed value
030   */
031  @SuppressWarnings("PMD.ShortMethodName")
032  @NonNull
033  static IAllowedValue of(
034      @NonNull String value,
035      @NonNull MarkupLine description,
036      @Nullable String deprecatedVersion) {
037    return new DefaultAllowedValue(value, description, deprecatedVersion);
038  }
039
040  /**
041   * Retrieves the enumerated value associated with this allowed value constraint
042   * entry.
043   *
044   * @return the value
045   */
046  @NonNull
047  String getValue();
048
049  /**
050   * If the value is deprecated, get the deprecated version.
051   *
052   * @return the deprecated version or {@code null} if the value is not deprecated
053   */
054  String getDeprecatedVersion();
055
056  /**
057   * Retrieves the enumerated value's description associated with this allowed
058   * value constraint entry.
059   *
060   * @return the description
061   */
062  @NonNull
063  MarkupLine getDescription();
064}
